law.text: A doctor of chiropractic, licensed to practice under the provisions of KRS Chapter 312, shall have his services to employees covered by the workers' compensation law paid for under the workers' compensation provisions of KRS Chapter 342. An employee claiming benefits under the provisions of KRS Chapter 342 shall have the right to choose the services of a licensed doctor of chiropractic.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 20, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 165, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978.
